opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM
AND NOW, this 5th day of October, 2016, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is GRANTED. The issue, rephrased for clarity, is:
Do district attorneys and their offices constitute “judicial agencies” as defined under Section 102 of the Right-to-Know-Law, 65 P.S. § 67.102?
opinions.author: PER CURIAM
